title: Dynamics
description: Motion of particles and mass center of bodies, kinematics and kinetics of rigid bodies in plane motion, work-energy and impulse-momentum methods, 3-D dynamics of rigid bodies.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Cannot be enrolled in one of the following Levels:
__HEADER_1__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: COE 2001 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C and (MATH 2403 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or MATH 2413 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or MATH 24X3 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or MATH 2552 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or MATH 2562 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or MATH 2X52 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of T)
